  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2917</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Current Events</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktuelle Fälle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Événements Actuels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Eventos Atuais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Eventi Correnti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρόντα γεγονότα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sucesos Actuales</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An online interactive unit about current events in different formats in the newspaper, includes worksheets</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">online unit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">news</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">newspapers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cartoons</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine interaktive Onlinemaßeinheit über aktuelle 
Fälle in den unterschiedlichen Formaten in der Zeitung, enthält 
Bogen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une unité interactive en ligne au sujet des 
événements actuels dans différents formats dans le journal, inclut 
des tableaux</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma unidade interativa em linha sobre eventos 
atuais em formatos diferentes no jornal, inclui folhas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'unità interattiva in linea circa gli eventi 
correnti nei formati differenti nel giornale, include i fogli di 
lavoro</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση διαλογική μονάδα για τα 
παρόντα γεγονότα με τις διαφορετικές μορφές στην εφημερίδα, 
περιλαμβάνει τα φύλλα εργασίας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una unidad interactiva en línea sobre sucesos 
actuales en diversos formatos en el periódico, incluye las hojas de 
trabajo</string>
          </description>
